items.title: Awesome Ada
items.content_text:
### Build and Package / Apache License

*   [cmake-ada-cho3 (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/cho3/cmake-ada) - CMake language support for Ada, fork of [plplot](https://sourceforge.net/projects/plplot/)'s cross-platform support code.

### Graphical User Interface / Apache License

*   [qt-ada](https://r3fowwcolhrzycn2yzlzzw.on.drv.tw/AdaStudio/qt6ada/qt6ada.html) - Ada-2012 port to Qt 6 framework.
items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### DevOps Tools / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

*   [wait-for (‚≠ê17)](https://github.com/dnnrly/wait-for) - Wait for something to happen (from the command line) before continuing. Easy orchestration of Docker services and other things.
items.content_html:

  • wait-for (‚≠ê17) - Wait for something to happen (from the command line) before continuing. Easy orchestration of Docker services and other things.
